name: Mr. :)
greetingText: Can I just say, your name really suits you.
wishText: May the boundless energy of the Divine be with you — as strength in challenges, clarity in confusion, and peace in your heart. ;)
text1: A day to celebrate someone truly amazing — youuu! :D
textInChatBox: Happy Birthdayyy you !! All the classic blah blah wishes — happiness, health, success — but with extra sincerity just for you
text2: Funny, I was going to do that only, but but but
text3: then I thought I’d add a special touch.
text4: I felt today deserved something different…
text5Entry: Because, you’re truly one of a kind.
text5Content: The world got happier the day you were born, and so did everyone who knows you — maybe that’s why Ganpati Bappa chose this day too, to make it even more special.
wishHeading: Happy Birthdayyy to the most special soul I’ve met— I hope this year brings you everything you’ve ever dreamed of.
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Liked what you found? Come back anytime — there’s always more waiting for you.
